DOC.brief_summary: Women present contraception offer IUS Skyla study participation . Daily bleed collect total 90 day correlate insertion time baseline endometrial thickness .
DOC.brief_title: Does Skyla Insertion Timing Impact Bleeding ?
DOC.criteria: Women age 1845 Parous nulliparous Desire Skyla contraception Regular menstrual cycle ( 2135 day ) Working mobile phone willing accept text message report daily bleed data 90 day Vaginal cesarean delivery past 12 week Abortion past 6 week Uterine anomaly distort uterus Acute pelvic inflammatory disease Uterine bleed unknown etiology Acute liver disease tumor History progestinsensitive cancer Abnormal pap smear await diagnostic therapeutic intervention
